name: Travelers Club Chicago Hardside Expandable Spinner Luggage, Teal, 22" Carry-On
short_description: Flexible Size & Set Options for Every Trip: Choose the 22” expandable carry-on alone, the 3-piece travel set (22” carry-on + 15” boarding tote + 10” travel kit), or the complete 5-piece set including 30”, 26”, and 22” suitcases with matching travel accessories
Durable ABS Hardside with Lightweight Construction: Rigid ABS shells protect your belongings while remaining easy to lift, maneuver, and check, ideal for frequent travel and longer trips
Expandable Design for Extra Packing Capacity: All suitcases expand to provide additional space when needed, giving you flexibility for souvenirs, returns, or extended travel
Smooth 360° Spinner Wheels & Telescoping Handle: Four multi-directional spinner wheels and a push-button telescopic handle deliver effortless rolling and stable control through airports and terminals

Coordinated Travel Accessories with Smart Features: Included in the 3 Piece Set and 5 Piece Set options are a 15” boarding tote with add-a-bag sleeve for secure stacking and a compact 10” travel kit to keep essentials organized and accessible
product_description: The Chicago Collection is built for travelers who want dependable performance, smart organization, and flexible options for every trip. Choose from a 22” expandable carry-on, a coordinated 3-piece travel set, or the complete 5-piece luggage system designed to cover everything from quick getaways to extended travel. Durable ABS hardside construction protects your belongings while remaining lightweight and easy to maneuver, and smooth 360° spinner wheels paired with a push-button telescoping handle ensure effortless mobility. Expandable compartments provide extra packing space when needed, while the included boarding tote and travel kit add convenience, organization, and seamless stacking for travel days that move fast.

name: Travelpro Platinum Elite Softside Expandable Carry on Luggage, 8 Wheel Spinner Suitcase, USB Port, Suiter, Men and Women, Vintage Grey, Carry On 21-Inch
short_description: EFFORTLESS MOBILITY: Patented Precision Glide System with magnetic self-aligning 360° dual spinner wheels, 4-stop PowerScope extension handle and non slip Contour Grip ensures stress free maneuverability. Top, side and bottom carry handles

POWER ON THE GO: External USB A&C ports with dedicated power bank pocket (power bank not included). Applicable power banks should be used for efficient cell phone charging - USB-A port output: 5V3A, 9V2A, 12V1.5A, 5V4.5A. USB-C port output: 5V2A

DURABLE, ORGANIZED TRAVEL: High-density nylon with DuraGuard coating resists wear. Tapered 2" expansion adds space and stability. Interior includes drop-in suiter, tie-down straps with accessory pockets, and a removable wet pocket

U.S. AIRLINE FRIENDLY: Overall Dimensions (includes wheels & carry handles): 23.5"x14.5"x9". Case Dimensions: 21"x14"x9". Weight: 7.8lbs. Sizer bin tested, fits most major US airlines overhead space. Fully expanded may not meet airline restrictions

WARRANTY: Limited Lifetime Coverage plus lifetime trusted companion promise, which covers the cost of repair for damage from airline or common carrier for the original purchaser or gift recipient. Valid for new purchases after registration
product_description: Maximize your carry-on with sophisticated style. The Platinum Elite 21" Expandable carry-on suitcase delivers big on form and function with a tip-resistant expansion that offers up to 2" more packing capacity. This premium Travelpro carry-on luggage features a deluxe tie-down system, integrated accessory pockets, and a removable quart-size wet pocket that is TSA compliant and perfect for toiletries. Plus, the drop-in, fold-out suiter is specifically designed to accommodate hanging clothes and prevent wrinkling. Built-in USB port lets you power up on the go, while a dedicated powerbank pocket for your back-up battery adheres to FAA regulations. Perfect for short to medium-length trips, this carry-on luggage with wheels is crafted with premium fabrics, genuine leather, and chrome zippers. Top-of-the-line mobility features include the PrecisionGlide system with eight MagnaTrac, self-aligning, 360-degree spinner wheels—making it one of the smoothest-rolling suitcases with wheels—guided by an adjustable PowerScope extension handle with patented Contour Grip and rubberized touch points for comfortable, easy maneuvering wherever you go. Whether you prefer softside luggage or hard cases, this versatile piece stands out among Travelpro luggage for its durability and style. It’s an ideal choice for travelers seeking reliable wheeled luggage that meets most airline carry-on requirements. Backed by our Built for a Lifetime Limited Worry-Free Warranty, which covers the cost of repair for damage from airline or other common carriers for the life of the bag after registration under the Trusted Companion Promise.

name: U.S. Traveler Anzio Softside Expandable Luggage with Spinner Wheels, Teal, 22-Inch Carry-on
short_description: Looking for the perfect travel companion that's durable, spacious, and convenient? Look no further than our top-quality carry-on spinner!

Crafted with 600D Oxford polyester, our spinners are built for long-lasting durability. This tightly woven fabric resists tears, abrasions, while offering lightweight strength and water resistance, making it ideal for protecting your belongings through repeated trips and changing travel conditions.

Featuring a multi-stage handle system that adjusts to different heights and 360-degree spinner wheels that offer effortless mobility, our spinners make it easy to navigate through airports, hotels, and other travel destinations with ease.
The 2-inch expansion addes valuable extra space, making it easy to pack additional travel essentials or bring home souvenirs without feeling cramped.
The spacious, fully lined main compartment makes packing easy, while compression straps keep items secure and help prevent shifting during travel.
product_description: Traveling is seamless with the Anzio Collection from U. S. Traveler. The Anzio Collection features 360-degree spinner wheels and a push-button multi-stage telescoping handle. The fully-lined interior features a mesh zipper pocket and tie-down straps to keep garments organized and in place. Each upright features two large exterior pockets and are expandable with a 2-inch gusset so you can easily organize all your travel essentials. Feel the sturdy telescoping handle system. It gives you hassle-free loading anywhere and peace of mind. This durable and spacious collection is the perfect purchase for your next trip! Durable micro-ballistic nylon ensures longevity. Multi-stage handle system adjusts to different heights. 2-inch expansion gusset offers extra packing space. 360-degree spinner wheels offer effortless mobility. Each upright rolls so there is no weight on your arm. Full interior lining and compression straps keep items in place. Large interior zippered mesh pocket provides easy organization. Two large exterior pockets come in handy when you have last minute items. 22” Expandable Softside Spinner: Exterior Dimensions: 22" H x 14" W x 8.5" (+2") D Exp.
